product_name: The North Face Anchor Bib Shell Pants - Men's
long_description: The North Face Anchor shell bib pants offer the style of freeride pants with the added comfort and protection of a bib, making them a staple of your 100-day season. 2-layer HyVent(R) shell pants are waterproof, windproof and breathable; seams are sealed to prevent moisture from seeping through. Bib top extends coverage for added warmth and protection; adjustable suspenders secure the fit. Features zippered front handwarmer pockets and flapped cargo pockets; kangaroo pouch pocket on bib stores accessories. Chimney Venting(TM) design uses stretch-mesh gaiters and zippered thigh vents with mesh gussets to let you control airflow and your comfort. Leg gaiters feature elastic grippers to seal out snow around boots and help regulate warmth. Reinforced hem guards protect your cuffs from abrasion and sharp edges, improving overall durability. Side-entry zipper for eased entry and exit; fit is relaxed at the waist with a roomy thigh, knee and cuff.
short_description: The North Face Anchor shell bib pants offer the style of freeride pants with the added comfort and protection of a bib, making them a staple of your 100-day season.
